plot: Felix rebolledo is a pimp owner of a cabaret, two bingo halls and three houses of appointments. Now intends to open a night club, and it has - as it has always done - with the support of the Bishop, which has bribed with frequent donations. With the support of the Church it is much more easy to count with the approval of the City Council, although, on the other hand, it also has bribed, among others, the Mayor and the President of the Council of the provincial government. This state of affairs is going to be seriously threatened with the arrival of Arcadius, seminarian and nephew of the Bishop. Arcadius, who left the seminar as "too frivolous" for him, now fills the vacancy of Secretary of his uncle, who had been left vacant. To find Rebolledo between friends "parishioners" of the Bishop, the chaste seminarian is greatly shocked. So much so that first thing do is to convince the wives of the Mayor and the President so they urge their husbands to refuse the opening of another "establishment of Vice and corruption". Open war just declared...
title: Los chulos

cast.role: Doña Loreto, la esposa del alcalde
cast.name: María Isbert
